concept.title: Configuring trusted certificates
concept.shortdesc: You can authenticate clients based on certificates by uploading the trusted certificates to the truststore. You can upload the trusted certificates by using the or by using .

conbody.p: Each trusted certificate that you upload is associated with a security profile. The certificate is used with that security profile to authenticate certificates that are presented by client applications. For performance reasons, you might want to upload CA certificates only. Uploading certificates for each client and associating each client certificate with a security profile might affect connection performance.
